title: Sales Executive (Automotive)
description: Join our sales team for vehicles and bikes. Meet monthly targets and maintain customer relationships.
description_ja: 車・バイクの営業。月次目標達成と顧客対応を担当。

title: Motorbike Mechanic
description: Service and repair 100–250cc bikes. Basic tools knowledge required. Training provided.
description_ja: 100〜250ccバイクの点検・整備・修理。基本的な工具知識が必要。研修あり。

title: Visa Consultant (Part-time)
title_ja: ビザコンサルタント（パート）
description: Guide clients on student/tourist visa files, checklists, and appointments. Flexible hours.
description_ja: 留学・観光ビザの書類作成、チェックリスト、予約支援。柔軟な勤務時間。

title: Warehouse Assistant
description: Handle goods receiving, binning, packing, and dispatch for parts and accessories.
description_ja: 部品・アクセサリーの入荷受け入れ、棚入れ、梱包、出荷を担当。

title: Customer Support (EN/JA)
title_ja: カスタマーサポート（日英）
description: Answer calls and messages, create quotations, and coordinate orders in English and Japanese.
description_ja: 電話・メッセージ対応、見積作成、日英での受注調整。

title: Electrical Technician
description: Install and maintain generators and UPS systems. Field visits included.
description_ja: 発電機やUPSの設置・保守。現場対応あり。
